headline: Kroger is laying off nearly 1,000 corporate employees. What to know
summary: On Aug. 26, Kroger told its staff it would be cutting a "meaningful number" of corporate employees.

headline: I’m 35, working bores me and I just came into a $1M inheritance. Can I quit my job and live off this windfall?
summary: Here’s what you need to know before you decide to quit your job and live on your new wealth.

headline: Kroger Announces Second Quarter Conference Call with Investors
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) announced today it will host its second quarter 2025 earnings conference call at 10:00 a.m. ET on Thursday, September 11, 2025. Kroger's management team will comment on financial and operational results for the second quarter 2025.

raw.headline: Kroger Announces Second Quarter Conference Call with Investors

headline: The list of major companies laying off staff this year including Intel, Scale AI, Morgan Stanley, and Meta
